entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Puvirnituq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:25 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -33.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Puvirnituq Airport 02:52 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -33.0°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -36.6°C
Wind: S 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 29. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
